sentences.en: "Aromatherapy oils" are not pure essential oils but dilutions.
sentences.cn: “香薰精油”并非纯精油，而是经过稀释的。

sentences.en: Enthusiasm, adaptability, sociability, and good health are essential.
sentences.cn: 富有热情、能适应环境、善于与人交往以及身体健康都是基本的条件。

sentences.en: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.cn: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

sentences.en: He lacked any of the practical common sense essential in management.
sentences.cn: 管理方面基本的实用常识他一点也不懂。

sentences.en: I believe it is essential that we act prudently.
sentences.cn: 我认为我们必须慎重行事。

sentences.en: Integrating the kids with the community, finding them a role, is essential.
sentences.cn: 使孩子融入社区并为他们找到某个角色非常必要。

sentences.en: It is essential that you are able to read a thermometer.
sentences.cn: 最基本的是要能看懂温度计。

sentences.en: It is essential that your diet is varied and balanced.
sentences.cn: 关键是你的饮食要多样化，并保持均衡。

sentences.en: It is essential to feel at ease with your therapist.
sentences.cn: 在治疗师面前放松下来是很重要的。

sentences.en: It's essential you make the right decisions from the word go.
sentences.cn: 关键是从一开始就作出正确的决定。

sentences.en: Jordan promised to trim the city budget without cutting essential services.
sentences.cn: 乔丹承诺在不减少基本服务的前提下，缩减市政预算。

sentences.en: Polyunsaturated oils are essential for health. Excess is harmful, however.
sentences.cn: 多不饱和油对健康很重要。但是，食用过量就会有害。

sentences.en: She packed a few essentials.
sentences.cn: 她把几件生活必需品装进箱子。

sentences.en: Speed is the essential ingredient of all athletics.
sentences.cn: 速度是所有田径运动项目的关键要素。

sentences.en: The authorities have said they will attempt to maintain essential services.
sentences.cn: 当局已表示他们将努力维持公共基础服务。

sentences.en: The essential difference between Sam and me was the fact that I took life seriously.
sentences.cn: 我和萨姆的根本区别在于我是认真对待生活的。

sentences.en: The essential point of relay racing is that it is a team effort.
sentences.cn: 接力赛跑的基本要点是讲究团队配合。

sentences.en: To help provide essential nourishment, we've put together these nutritious drinks.
sentences.cn: 为了帮助提供必要的营养，我们调配了这些营养饮料。

sentences.en: We have no reason to doubt the essentials of the girl’s story.
sentences.cn: 我们没有理由怀疑这个女孩描述中的要点。

sentences.en: What essential piece of clothing would you take?
sentences.cn: 你会带哪件必不可少的衣服呢？

sentences.en: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.cn: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

trans.tran_en: the essential part, quality, or feature of something is the most basic one
